name: Luigi's Rodeo!
description:
TOUCH THE BALL

HOW LONG CAN YOU TOUCH IT?

10 SECONDS?

HA HA HA!

  • Note that this game has some sounds so do whatever you want with your volume so it's not scary
  • No touch support yet unless you repeatedly tap the ball
  • Made with three.js and ammo.js in notepad++. I had never used three.js before and now I think it's neat.
  • Bull model is from https://free3d.com/3d-model/bull-v2--517661.html
  • Moo sound is from Worms Armageddon
  • Song is Rumble Strip by The Defibulators
  • Luigi is from Nintendo
